019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
022import java.lang.reflect.Method;
023import java.util.ArrayList;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Map;
026import java.util.Optional;
027import java.util.logging.Logger;
028
029public class DataPath {
030
031    protected static final Logger logger
032        = Logger.getLogger(DataPath.class.getName());
033
034    private DataPath() {
035    }
036
037    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseLocaleWithCaseConversions")
038    public static <T> Optional<T> get(Object from, Object... selectors) {
039        Object cur = from;
040        for (var selector : selectors) {
041            if (selector instanceof String && cur instanceof Map map) {
042                cur = map.get(selector);
043                continue;
044            }
045            if (selector instanceof Number index && cur instanceof List list) {
046                cur = list.get(index.intValue());
047                continue;
048            }
049            if (selector instanceof String property) {
050                var retrieved = tryAccess(cur, property);
051                if (retrieved.isEmpty()) {
052                    return Optional.empty();
053                }
054                cur = retrieved.get();
055            }
056        }
057        return Optional.ofNullable((T) cur);
058    }
059
060    private static Optional<Object> tryAccess(Object obj, String property) {
061        Method acc = null;
062        try {
063            // Try getter
064            acc = obj.getClass().getMethod("get" + property.substring(0, 1)
065                .toUpperCase() + property.substring(1));
066        } catch (SecurityException e) {
067            return Optional.empty();
068        } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) { // NOPMD
069            // Can happen...
070        }
071        if (acc == null) {
072            try {
073                // Try method
074                acc = obj.getClass().getMethod(property);
075            } catch (SecurityException | NoSuchMethodException e) {
076                return Optional.empty();
077            }
078        }
079        if (acc != null) {
080            try {
081                return Optional.ofNullable(acc.invoke(obj));
082            } catch (IllegalAccessException
083                    | InvocationTargetException e) {
084                return Optional.empty();
085            }
086        }
087        return Optional.empty();
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * Attempts to make a as-deep-as-possible copy of the given
092     * container. New containers will be created for Maps, Lists and
093     * Arrays. The method is invoked recursively for the entries/items.
094     * 
095     * If invoked with an object that is neither a map, list or array,
096     * the methods checks if the object implements {@link Cloneable}
097     * and if it does, invokes its {@link Object#clone()} method.
098     * Else the method return the object.
099     *
100     * @param <T> the generic type
101     * @param object the container
102     * @return the t
103     */
104    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CognitiveComplexity", "unchecked" })
105    public static <T> T deepCopy(T object) {
106        if (object instanceof Map map) {
107            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
108            Map<Object, Object> copy;
109            try {
110                copy = (Map<Object, Object>) object.getClass().getConstructor()
111                    .newInstance();
112            } catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException
113                    | IllegalArgumentException | InvocationTargetException
114                    | NoSuchMethodException | SecurityException e) {
115                logger.severe(
116                    () -> "Cannot create new instance of " + object.getClass());
117                return null;
118            }
119            for (var entry : ((Map<?, ?>) map).entrySet()) {
120                copy.put(entry.getKey(),
121                    deepCopy(entry.getValue()));
122            }
123            return (T) copy;
124        }
125        if (object instanceof List list) {
126            List<Object> copy = new ArrayList<>();
127            for (var item : list) {
128                copy.add(deepCopy(item));
129            }
130            return (T) copy;
131        }
132        if (object.getClass().isArray()) {
133            var copy = new ArrayList<>();
134            for (var item : (Object[]) object) {
135                copy.add(deepCopy(item));
136            }
137            return (T) copy.toArray();
138        }
139        if (object instanceof Cloneable) {
140            try {
141                return (T) object.getClass().getMethod("clone")
142                    .invoke(object);
143            } catch (IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException
144                    | NoSuchMethodException | SecurityException e) {
145                return object;
146            }
147        }
148        return object;
149    }
150}
